text: The Adelaide 36ers are an Australian professional basketball team from Adelaide. The team plays in the National Basketball League (NBL). The Adelaide 36ers are the only NBL team from South Australia, and the "36" in the teams name comes from the fact that the Colony of South Australia was founded on 28 December 1836. They play their home games at the Adelaide Entertainment Centre. ==References== Category:Australian basketball teams 36ers
title: Adelaide 36ers
